text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del na pi ban brab rueng samngeat muoy dl phriyea robsa keat( ha hv saoh) haey nowpel del neang ban brab ruengreav noh( dl a ai shah) pelnoh a l laoh ban leatatradeang rueng noh aoy na pi doeng . keat kaban brab( ha hv saoh) aoy doeng nouv rueng muoychamnuon ning leak muoychamnuon . haey nowpel del keat ban brab rueng teangnoh dl neang neang ban suor tha tae anaknea brab rueng nih dl anak . keat kaban chhlaey tha ku mcheasa del mha doeng chruotachreab ban brab khnhom
